text: Rain’s great—perfect excuse for less roof work more carving time!
Rainy days mean fewer cuts less dust better focus
retirement savings plan? more like myth-making workshop tbh
even ikea manuals make more sense than adulting tbh
yeah right off-script means unpaid bills dood
measure twice cut once even when baking pizza

not everyone's racing down the same track after hitting thirty guys let’s not pretend we've all got those checkboxes ready for ticking off every society-imposed milestone just because another decade rolls by some folks prefer taking scenic detours before picking up that picket fence dream anyway who says life gets less interesting post dirty thirty huh
gender bias? man even got it rough at craft gigs
